title: Sec. of Energy Jennifer M. Granholm (Extended Cut)
description:
U.S. Secretary of Energy Jennifer M. Granholm makes her first visit to The Late Show to discuss the details of the massive climate bill that just passed the Senate in this Pod Show exclusive extended interview.
